bib.title: Words, concepts and relations in the construction of Polish WordNet
bib.author: Derwojedowa, Magdalena and Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stanis{\textordfeminine}aw and Zawis{\l}awska, Magdalena and Broda, Bartosz
bib.abstract: A Polish WordNet has been under construction for two years. We discuss the organisation of the project, the fundamental assumptions, the tools and the resources. We show how our work differs from that done on EuroWordNet and BalkaNet. In a year we expect the network to reach 20000 lexical units. Some 12000 entries will have been completed by hand. Work on others will be automated as far as possible; to that end, we have developed statistics-based semantic similarity functions and methods based on a form of chunking. The
